sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2012/L.8), the SBI notes progress in setting out some of the features of the possible appeals body and that different views remain on, inter alia , the issue of scope.

The SBI agrees to continue its consideration of the matter at SBI 37 on the basis of, inter alia , the draft text contained in the annex with a view to forwarding a draft decision for consideration by CMP 8.
